channel.title: ERROR: Resource with id or reference doesn't exist
channel.description:
Hi Team,
I am new to Stackstorm. I have created a simple pack & actions.
while running the actions, I got the below error.
sudo st2 action execute ArulPing_st2.ping ip=40.117.95.248 ERROR: Resource with id or reference "ArulPing_st2.ping" doesn't exist.

item.title: ERROR: Resource with id or reference doesn't exist
item.dc:creator: arul
item.description:
Hi Team,

I am new to Stackstorm. I have created a simple pack & actions.

while running the actions, I got the below error.

sudo st2 action execute ArulPing_st2.ping ip=40.117.95.248
ERROR: Resource with id or reference “ArulPing_st2.ping” doesn’t exist.

Read full topic
